item.title: [VB6]Startup Time Optimizer
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

Wow this place is no better than sythe or anything. Complete douche bags here I’ve been trying to contribute and all I get is flame ridiculous. The point of this forum has died basically. Jagex has won stop playing runescape. All the good scripters have left.

Fuck, I don’t even know what the fuck I was thinking coming back here to douche bags like the lot of you. Heck, fucking ban me the fuck do I care? Theres nothing of value on this forum. Next time I even choose to come to this site I expect to see me banned I don’t wanna see this bullshit again.

io9 why do you even choose to flame me? What good does that serve you? Does this make you feel all tingly inside? Fuck I don’t even kno why the fuck i’m wasting my goddamn time posting this just

[size=20pt]If you feel that this is tl;dr the point is just ban me plz[/size]

item.title: [VB6]Startup Time Optimizer
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:11, topic:252461”][quote author=N00b1 link=topic=333432.msg2601240#msg2601240 date=1230241669]

I have no idea why don’t you try it? I haven’t touched linux in my life but I guess it wouldn’t work as windows and linux are two separate OSes.

He was being sarcastic you retarded twat.

io9 i mean wtf how the hell was he suppose to know… he actually tried to answer his question… do i have to go dig up my pwnd riger game again… remember that one? the sled is modelled after you remember?..

wtf is up with all these douche bags… Grow the fuck up or GTFO -> or in the good words of pwnd http://gtfomyinter.net/
[/quote]

  1. c|p has the CM rank under his name. I would assume someone of that rank would have basic computer competency.
  2. The sled/pwnd thing was awesome.
  3. I was the one who told Pwnd to use that image (for gtfomyinter.net).[/quote]1) So I assume being an asshole follows the CM rank?
  5. Good. Now you can relate to it and wont be as disappointed when you GTFO.

item.title: [VB6]Startup Time Optimizer
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

Keep in mind I wasn’t the one to have thought of changing the registry (guy on youtube gave me idea). http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms692127(VS.85).aspx
So I’ve looked this key up on MSDN to discover that it controls the delay before the indexing service start to work and scanning. I think changing the delay will index the files and catalogs earlier and thus boot faster.

Read full topic

item.title: [VB6]Startup Time Optimizer
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Unhandled:

What exactly is this start up delay for? I mean, I know Microsoft is stupid, but stupid enough to increase boot times for no reason?

Maybe it’s how long it waits for USB devices to settle, or something along that sort…

Read full topic
